Name: HELLO PLAYER
About the game: Hello, dear potential player! I made a little Platformer game in which I implemented some of my ideas. Fair to say that I'm not a professional in game design and I work alone so I couldn't make everything I wanted. Nevertheless, you're gonna have: Comfortable controls & Impact Diversity of movement mechanics A lot of cool levels Enjoyable minimalistic visual style Total absence of the fourth wall Funny story line Also about the story line! The idea is that various bloggers invaded the game and for different spoiled a nice and simple adventure by adding tons of deadly traps! By the way, one of the main characters is me! If you try my little experiment I will be grateful! See you in the game!
